channel.description: 2 ACLs This chapter covers the following exam topics: 5.0 Security Fundamentals 5.6 Configure and verify access control lists Can be used to match packets for applying Quality of Service (QoS) features. ACL Location and Direction inbound to the router, before the router makes its forwarding (routing) decisionoutbound, after the router makes its forwarding decision and has determined the exit interface to use.enable an ACL on an interface that processes the packet, in the direction the packet flows through that interface.the router then processes every inbound or outbound IP packet using that ACL Taking Action When a Match Occurs
